notes: Nusa Dua, Bali. Iconic clifftop luxury resort with dedicated PR team. Actively produces influencer content and runs creator campaigns. Press room on site with downloadable assets.

Ubud, Bali. 5-star luxury boutique resort set in Petulu Valley. Has dedicated media room with press releases and hi-res images. Actively works with travel media and influencers. Alternative marcom contact: marcom@viceroybali.com
Sanur, Bali. Beachfront luxury resort under IHG. Dedicated press page with named media contact. Excellent fit for lifestyle and travel creators.

Seminyak, Bali. Artisan-crafted 5-star boutique hotel by Potato Head Family. Handcrafted Balinese design, adjacent to Desa Potato Head. Strong editorial coverage. Ideal for fashion and luxury content creators.

Manggis, East Bali. Iconic Aman clifftop resort overlooking the Lombok Strait. Three-tiered infinity pools, ultra-luxury setting. Aman has a central press email for all properties. Perfect for ultra-luxury content.

Ubud, Bali. One Michelin Key boutique hotel and villa resort with jungle valley views. Has dedicated media center with press image library. Featured in Conde Nast Traveller, Telegraph. Great for lifestyle/wellness creators.

Ubud & Keramas Beach, Bali. Collection of Balinese-owned luxury boutique resorts (Bisma, Keramas Beach, Tanggayuda). Dedicated media contact page. Cultural authenticity and rice paddy views. Strong press presence.

Munduk, North Bali. Eco-luxury resort on a working coffee plantation at 1000m elevation. Breathtaking infinity pool views across Bali. 110K Instagram followers. Frequently featured in luxury travel media. Great for nature/wellness content.

Ubud, Bali. Boutique resort in the heart of Ubud, walking distance to Monkey Forest and Hanoman Street. Part of Alaya Hotels group with multiple Bali properties. Spa, pools, and cultural programming. Good fit for wellness and travel creators.

Jimbaran Bay, Bali. Iconic 5-star resort with famous Rock Bar. 479K Instagram followers. AYANA Hospitality manages multiple properties. Also home to RIMBA by AYANA. Highly sought after for luxury content creation.

Multiple properties across Indonesia: Plataran Ubud, Plataran Komodo, Plataran Menjangan (West Bali National Park), Villa Canggu by Plataran. Award-winning sustainable luxury. Komodo property ranked #1 in East Nusa Tenggara by TripAdvisor. Good for multi-destination campaigns.

Labuan Bajo, Flores. Named Best for Romance by Conde Nast Johansens. 2025 Michelin Guide Key Hotel. No.1 resort in East Nusa Tenggara on TripAdvisor. Private island feel near Komodo National Park. Excellent for adventure and luxury creators.

Labuan Bajo, Flores. First 5-star resort on Labuan Bajo's Waecicu Beach, gateway to Komodo National Park. 119K Instagram followers. 189 rooms plus 12 suites. Phinisi ship cruises. Perfect for adventure/luxury content.

brand_name: Ta'aktana, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Labuan Bajo
notes: Labuan Bajo, Flores. Newly opened Marriott Luxury Collection resort on the shores of Flores Island. Overwater villas, infinity pools, direct access to Komodo National Park. Strong editorial buzz. Great for luxury travel creators.

Labuan Bajo, Flores. 5-star hilltop resort with panoramic views over the marina and Flores Sea. 20K Instagram followers. Centrally located near Labuan Bajo marina. Good for Komodo adventure + luxury content.

West Sumba, Nusa Tenggara Timur. Boutique luxury resort celebrating Sumbanese heritage. Clifftop villas, infinity pools overlooking the Indian Ocean. 22K Instagram followers. Perfect for remote/off-the-beaten-path luxury content. Near NIHI Sumba.

Raja Ampat, West Papua. Remote private island eco-luxury dive resort and conservation centre. Max 40 guests, 4:1 staff-to-guest ratio. 26K Instagram followers. Among the world's most biodiverse marine environments. Ideal for conservation, dive, and ultra-luxury content creators.

Birie Island, Raja Ampat, West Papua. Eco-resort on an uninhabited island in the heart of the Coral Triangle. Pristine reefs, wildlife, and remote paradise aesthetic. 14K Instagram followers. Great for eco-conscious creators and adventure travel.

Nusa Penida, Bali. 5-star eco-luxury resort on hilltop of Gamat Bay. 24 rooms and 26 private villas. Adventure, wellness, and sustainable design. 15K Instagram followers. Dramatic cliffside views. Excellent for lifestyle and adventure content.

Senggigi, Lombok. Only boutique beachfront property on Lombok's west coast. Secluded beach on the Indian Ocean. Part of Jeeva Resorts group (also Beloam, Santai). 6K Instagram followers. Intimate setting for lifestyle and travel content.

Mangsit, Senggigi, Lombok. 5-star beachfront boutique hotel and villas on a narrow stretch of pristine beach. Art-inspired design. 12K Instagram followers. Dedicated press page on website. Adult-oriented, design-led. Good for fashion and lifestyle creators.

Gili Air, Gili Islands. Small collection of luxury art-deco private villas. Member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Michelin Guide listed. All villas have private pools. Intimate island setting. Perfect for fashion and luxury travel content.

Echo Beach, Canggu, Bali. Eco-friendly beach club constructed from over 3,500 reclaimed fishing boats. Iconic sustainable design, oceanfront sunsets. 209K Instagram followers. Strong brand identity. Perfect for fashion, lifestyle, and eco-conscious content creators. Also: bookings@labrisa-bali.com

Canggu, Bali. World's Best Beach Club, 170m beachfront. 548K Instagram followers. In-house influencer marketing manager. Premium photos, events, and vibrant social media. Top-tier venue for content creators and models.

Seminyak, Bali. One of Asia's most iconic beach clubs since 2000. Breakfast through sunset, world-class events. 125K Instagram followers. Digital Marketing Specialist on staff. Excellent for fashion, lifestyle, and luxury content.

brand_name: Sundara Beach Club at Four Seasons Bali
notes: Jimbaran Bay, Bali. Beach club and restaurant at Four Seasons Resort. 57-meter infinity pool, beachfront setting, renowned Sunday brunch. Prestige Four Seasons association. Ideal for luxury lifestyle and F&B content.

Seminyak/Kerobokan, Bali. Popular beach club with massive saltwater pool. 139K Instagram followers. Has in-house content strategist. Strong visual brand. Great for swimwear, lifestyle, and model content creation.

Canggu, Bali. Luxury lifestyle private villa resort with beachfront access to Batu Bolong. Home-style hospitality concept, private pools. 11K Instagram followers. Boutique and intimate. Good for lifestyle and fashion content.

Multiple locations across Bali (Seminyak, Canggu, Ubud), Lombok, and beyond. Asia's leading luxury villa rental and management company. 89K Instagram followers. Dedicated press portal at press.elitehavens.com. Has hosted major influencers like Nikita Willy, Maudy Ayunda. Excellent gateway to multiple ultra-luxury villas.

Seminyak, Bali. Spectacular design-led villa resort, 23 private pool villas with signature sloping roofs. Minutes from Seminyak's best restaurants and sunset beach bars. Managed by Bali Hospitality Group. Strong editorial aesthetic. Perfect for fashion and luxury content.
Seminyak, Bali. 4-star boutique resort adjacent to Potato Head Beach Club. 62 rooms with pools, prime Seminyak location. Good for lifestyle and fashion creators wanting to access the Seminyak scene.

West Bali National Park, Bali. Award-winning eco-luxury safari resort. 29K Instagram followers. Nature immersion, walking safaris, snorkelling. Unique jungle and marine UNESCO heritage. Ideal for sustainability and adventure content creators.

South Coast, Lombok. Exclusive eco-luxury beach camp on a remote, pristine white sand beach. Completely off-grid feel. Part of Jeeva Resorts group. Stunning raw natural scenery. Ideal for adventurous and sustainable travel creators.

Nusa Penida, Bali. Bamboo boutique hotel with French-inspired eatery, infinity pool, and cocktail bar. Nusa Penida's dramatic landscapes make for compelling content. Growing destination with fewer competing properties.

Nusa Penida, Bali. Boutique hotel with nature-inspired design. Small, intimate property. Nusa Penida offers iconic Instagram locations (Kelingking Beach, Diamond Beach). Great for authentic travel and lifestyle creators seeking less crowded settings.

Ubud, Bali. COMO Hotels' quiet luxury property dedicated to Balinese culture and wellness. COMO Shambhala Spa, yoga, cooking classes. Understated luxury aesthetic. Featured in Wallpaper and Conde Nast. Ideal for wellness and cultural content.

Senggigi, Lombok. Secluded boutique villas set in a coconut grove. Romantic and tranquil beach setting. Part of Jeeva Resorts group known for quality and authenticity on Lombok. Good for couple, romance, and slow travel content.
